snippet: The Carolina Panthers are eager to register their first Super Bowl triumph against the Denver Broncos in Sunday's Super Bowl 50, but it was patience that turned them into an NFL powerhouse....
lead_paragraph: The Carolina Panthers are eager to register their first Super Bowl triumph against the Denver Broncos in Sunday's Super Bowl 50, but it was patience that turned them into an NFL powerhouse.

headline.main: Patience Pays Off for Panthers in Super Bowl Bid
headline.print_headline: Patience Pays Off for Panthers in Super Bowl Bid
